Text: because this gem is a rather obscure film, best bet might be to seed this to 99% availability until several  in the swarm are also at 99%, otherwise if the first couple across the finish line bounce, the torrent won't reach reasonable health.. (observations of a veteran collector)
I'll be seeding this until I've uploaded at the minimum 20 copies, and probably keep seeding for at least a month regardless.

unfortunately, the ultrafast seedboxers sometimes hit & run the early copies.. wanna see this one survive!

by the way, thx for this..
